thread.title: BRIEF-JLL Posts Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.71

title: BRIEF-JLL Posts Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.71
text:
February 7, 2018 / 12:44 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-JLL Posts Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.71 Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Jones Lang Lasalle Inc: * JLL REPORTS STRONG FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $4.92 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.71 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 17 PERCENT TO $2.5 BILLION 
* IMPACT OF TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT ON DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE WAS $3.09, WITH NO IMPACT TO ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE FOR QUARTER * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $2.27 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT WERE $58.1 BILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017, A DECREASE OF 3 PERCENT 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.22 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
